subject: Newbie - Sequel to earlier question - Kindly help
msgSnippet: As a sequel to my previous question about Login, kindly let me know how do I test any button submit process using Junit. If I am in Screen1 and I set some
messageBody:
As a sequel to my previous question about Login, kindly let me know
how do I test any button submit process using Junit.

If I am in Screen1 and I set some parameters on this screen and do a
submit how do I test the result is right ?

Should I use httpunit or Cactus ?

On Submit,I call a Servlet

Thanks
Anand
